desc.1: Order Drusilla and Anastella to attack up to 4 times, dealing <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</ct> and <ct color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Performing other actions with Rina during Drusilla and Anastella's attacks will not interrupt Rina's <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct> combo count.

desc.1: Calls back Drusilla and Anastella to swing them around for a ranged attack, dealing <ct color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.0: Press <IconNormal /> during a dodge to activate:
desc.1: Order Drusilla and Anastella to execute a piercing attack, dealing <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</ct>.

desc.0: Press <IconNormal /> during a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</ct> to activate:
desc.1: Order Drusilla and Anastella to spin forward and trigger an explosion, dealing <ct color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.1: Order Anastella to execute a downward smash, dealing <ct color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</ct>
desc.2: Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.

EXSpecialAttackDimwitDisappearingTrick.name: EX Special Attack: Dimwit Disappearing Trick

desc.0: With enough Energy, press <IconSpecialReady /> to activate:
desc.1: Order Drusilla and Anastella to execute multiple downward smashes, dealing massive <ct color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
desc.3: A <ct color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</ct> is triggered when this skill hits an enemy.

desc.0: When a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct> is triggered, select the character to activate:
desc.1: Order Drusilla and Anastella to push forward and generate a ball-shaped electrical field that deals massive <ct color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</ct>.
desc.2: During this skill, Drusilla and Anastella are unable to perform <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attacks</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attacks</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Special Attacks</ct>, and <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attacks</ct>, but can be recalled to Rina's side through <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Shoo the Fool</ct>.
desc.3: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
desc.4: A <ct color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</ct> is triggered when this skill hits an enemy.

desc.0: When Decibel Rating is at <ct color=#FFFFFF>Maximum</ct>, press <IconUltimateReady /> to activate:
desc.1: Order Drusilla and Anastella to spin forward, dealing massive <ct color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</ct>.
desc.2: During this skill, Drusilla and Anastella are unable to respond to <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</ct>, or <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</ct> commands, but can be recalled to Rina's side through <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Shoo the Fool</ct>.
desc.3: Upon activating this skill, the other squad members recover 10 Energy. The next character to switch in recovers an additional 20 Energy.
desc.4: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
desc.5: A <ct color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</ct> is triggered when this skill hits an enemy.

desc.0: When the active character is launched, press <IconSwitch /> to activate:
desc.1: Order Drusilla and Anastella to spin forward and trigger an explosion, dealing <ct color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.0: When the character on field is about to be attacked, press <IconSwitch /> to activate:
desc.1: Dodges the enemy's attack and activates <ct color=#FFFFFF>Vital View</ct>.
desc.2: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.0: Press <IconNormal /> after an <ct color=#FFFFFF>Evasive Assist</ct> to activate:
desc.1: Order Drusilla and Anastella to push forward and generate an electrical vortex, dealing <ct color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

core.name: Core Passive: Mini Destruction Partner
desc: When ordering Drusilla or Anastella to attack, other squad members' PEN Ratio increases together with Rina's, by 25% of Rina's PEN Ratio + <ct color=#2BAD00>6%</ct>, up to 30%. The effect ends when both Drusilla and Anastella return to Rina.

When ordering Drusilla or Anastella to attack, other squad members' PEN Ratio increases together with Rina's, by 25% of Rina's PEN Ratio + <ct color=#2BAD00>7.5%</ct>, up to 30%. The effect ends when both Drusilla and Anastella return to Rina.

When ordering Drusilla or Anastella to attack, other squad members' PEN Ratio increases together with Rina's, by 25% of Rina's PEN Ratio + <ct color=#2BAD00>9%</ct>, up to 30%. The effect ends when both Drusilla and Anastella return to Rina.

When ordering Drusilla or Anastella to attack, other squad members' PEN Ratio increases together with Rina's, by 25% of Rina's PEN Ratio + <ct color=#2BAD00>10.2%</ct>, up to 30%. The effect ends when both Drusilla and Anastella return to Rina.

When ordering Drusilla or Anastella to attack, other squad members' PEN Ratio increases together with Rina's, by 25% of Rina's PEN Ratio + <ct color=#2BAD00>10.8%</ct>, up to 30%. The effect ends when both Drusilla and Anastella return to Rina.

When ordering Drusilla or Anastella to attack, other squad members' PEN Ratio increases together with Rina's, by 25% of Rina's PEN Ratio + <ct color=#2BAD00>11.4%</ct>, up to 30%. The effect ends when both Drusilla and Anastella return to Rina.

When ordering Drusilla or Anastella to attack, other squad members' PEN Ratio increases together with Rina's, by 25% of Rina's PEN Ratio + <ct color=#2BAD00>12%</ct>, up to 30%. The effect ends when both Drusilla and Anastella return to Rina.

desc.0: When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
desc.1: Increases the duration of <ct color=#2EB6FF>Shock</ct> inflicted on enemies by any character by 3s. When <ct color=#2EB6FF>Shocked</ct> enemies are on the field, all squad members' <ct color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</ct> increases by 10%.

desc.0: After being sent out to launch an attack, Drusilla and Anastella stay in place for an additional 5.5s before returning to Rina.
desc.1: The effect gained from <ct color=#FFFFFF>Core Passive: Mini Destruction Partner</ct> by characters within 10m is increased to 130% of the original value.

flavor.0: "Get your work done, or you're in for a beating!" is how Drusilla tries to encourage everyone.
flavor.1: "Yeah, a beating!" Anastella always chimes in.

2.name: Master's Paragon
2.desc: Upon becoming the active character in combat, Rina's DMG increases by 15% for 12s. This effect can trigger once every 18s.
2.flavor: "It takes an excellent head maid to lead excellent maids, and an exemplary master to raise exemplary Bangboo." â€” Excerpt from Rina's speech at the "Victoria Housekeeping Human Resource Management and Bangboo Training Insight Seminar."

3.name: Head Maid's Specialty
3.desc: <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dodge</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Assist</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</ct>, and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct> Lv. +2

flavor.0: Rina always has the confidence to excel at anything and the ability to annihilate everything.
flavor.1: However, when it comes to being in the mood to annihilate enemies, both her confidence and capability align.

4.name: Needle and Hammer
4.desc: Rina's Energy Regen increases by 0.5/s when both Drusilla and Anastella are deployed. The effect ends when Drusilla or Anastella returns to Rina.

flavor.0: Drusilla and Anastella can never agree on anything.
flavor.1: "Beating up the dummy in front" is an exception.

5.name: Head Maid Perfectionist
5.desc: <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dodge</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Assist</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</ct>, and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct> Lv. +2

flavor.0: "Rina" means perfection in the Bangboo language.
flavor.1: Perfectionism is the number one rule in the Victoria Housekeeping handbook.
flavor.2: And Rina has her own criteria for judging "perfection."

6.name: Stormy Night's Fright
6.desc: When an <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct> or <ct color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</ct> hits an enemy, the entire squad's <ct color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</ct> is increased by 15% for 8s.

flavor.0: Thunder rumbles in the old castle on a rainy night. The depths of the long corridors are filled with eerie shadows.
flavor.1: Fear circuits overloaded, the filming of a thriller commences.
